Bloomington.Sanshin Zen Community:
Sanshin Zen Community is a Soto Zen sangha based at the temple Sanshin-ji in Bloomington, Indiana founded by Shohaku Okumura. 


== History ==
Founded in 1996, the temple name Sanshinji (三心寺, sanshin-ji) literally means "temple of the three minds". This refer to the "three minds" cultivated in Zen practice: magnanimous mind, parental mind, and joyful mind.
